recentPerformance.last5Games: Just beat UTEP 74-63 in Jacksonville Classic opener
recentPerformance.cushion: Tribe's pace and depth should overwhelm

keyFactors.title: Hot Streak
keyFactors.description: William & Mary on 4-game win streak, playing with confidence in Jacksonville Classic

keyFactors.title: Balanced Attack
keyFactors.description: Tribe averaging 82.4 PPG with multiple scorers - hard to game plan against

keyFactors.title: ACU Struggles
keyFactors.description: Abilene Christian 3-2 with loss to Texas A&M-CC - inconsistent early season

riskFactors: Small spread suggests close game expected
ACU could play above their level

quarterBreakdown.description: W&M established control early, led 39-32 at half. Tribe's pressure created turnovers.
Complete domination. W&M outscored ACU 53-26 in second half. Six players in double figures. Tribe shot 64.7% for game.

gameResults.whenCleared: Covered -1.5 by halftime. Second half was victory lap - won by 34 total.
gameResults.gamePace: W&M pushed tempo relentlessly - 33 fastbreak points
gameResults.turningPoint: 21 ACU turnovers turned into 21 points - defensive pressure was suffocating

whatWentRight.title: Defensive Pressure
whatWentRight.description: Tribe forced 21 turnovers, converted all 21 into points

whatWentRight.title: Shooting Efficiency
whatWentRight.description: 64.7% from field was outstanding - one of best shooting games of season

whatWentRight.title: Balanced Scoring
whatWentRight.description: Six players in double figures - impossible to stop

postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: This exceeded expectations significantly. The thesis was correct but the margin (34 points) was an outlier - expected closer game. Great result regardless.

closingLineValue.verdict: Positive CLV - got slightly better line than closing. Market moved toward W&M as expected.

keyTakeaways: Small spreads on hot teams can lead to blowout covers
Defensive pressure creating turnovers is a recipe for blowouts
W&M's balanced scoring made them impossible to stop
Jacksonville Classic sweep shows Tribe is legit mid-major contender
Sometimes -1.5 favorites win by 34 - variance goes both ways
verdict: Perfect execution - identified hot team with balanced attack, got great line, crushed cover. Jacksonville Classic sweep validates W&M as quality program.
